dataset_summary:
DATASET: WorkforceAIAdoption.csv
Shape: 100 rows x 10 columns

COLUMNS:
  - Company_ID [int64]
  - Industry [object]
  - Company_Size [object]
  - AI_Adoption_Level_0_100 [float64]
  - Automation_Rate_pct [float64]
  - Training_Hours_per_Employee [float64]
  - Productivity_Growth_pct [float64]
  - Layoff_Rate_pct [float64]
  - Employee_Satisfaction_Score_0_100 [float64]
  - AI_Tier [object]

SAMPLE ROWS (first 5):
  Row 1: Company_ID=1, Industry=Logistics, Company_Size=Large, AI_Adoption_Level_0_100=26.0, Automation_Rate_pct=22.0, Training_Hours_per_Employee=8.4, Productivity_Growth_pct=-0.42, Layoff_Rate_pct=11.9 ...

  Row 4: Company_ID=4, Industry=Education, Company_Size=Enterprise, AI_Adoption_Level_0_100=44.6, Automation_Rate_pct=25.4, Training_Hours_per_Employee=28.4, Productivity_Growth_pct=0.38, Layoff_Rate_pct=1.7 ...
  Row 5: Company_ID=5, Industry=Logistics, Company_Size=Small, AI_Adoption_Level_0_100=86.9, Automation_Rate_pct=40.4, Training_Hours_per_Employee=26.9, Productivity_Growth_pct=4.72, Layoff_Rate_pct=3.2 ...

agents.name: Harper Nguyen
agents.persona_text: Workforce analytics lead focused on whether training cushions automation impacts and improves retention.

agents.name: Ibrahim Khan
agents.persona_text: Data QA engineer who checks metric definitions and hunts inconsistent ranges across companies.

agents.name: Selin Yılmaz
agents.persona_text: Quant researcher who tests moderation effects (training vs layoffs) and avoids causal overreach.

agents.name: Ethan Brooks
agents.persona_text: Visualization specialist who builds dashboards for execs: tiers, risk flags, and driver charts.

agents.name: Dr. Keiko Tanaka
agents.persona_text: Innovation strategist who balances productivity gains with human outcomes like satisfaction.
